destinations.name: Machu Picchu

cost.notes: Foreign tourist ticket for the citadel

destinations.description: Ancient 15th-century Inca city located in the Peruvian Andes at 2,430 meters above sea level, known for its impressive ruins and panoramic views.

destinations.name: Great Wall of China
destinations.address: Badaling Section, Yanqing District, Beijing, China

cost.notes: Basic adult entry in the off-season

destinations.description: Ancient fortification of over 21,000 km built to protect the Chinese empire from invasions, considered one of the seven wonders of the modern world.

destinations.name: Santorini

cost.notes: Free access to the village, accommodation costs starting from 100 EUR per night

destinations.description: Volcanic island with spectacular views of the Aegean Sea, famous for its white houses with blue domes, black sand beaches, and romantic sunsets.

destinations.name: Grand Canyon
destinations.address: Grand Canyon National Park, AZ 86023, United States
destinations.description: Spectacular geological formation carved by the Colorado River over millions of years, with depths of up to 1,800 meters and 446 km in length.

destinations.name: Taj Mahal
destinations.address: Dharmapuri, Forest Colony, Tajganj, Agra, Uttar Pradesh 282001, India
destinations.description: Majestic white marble mausoleum built by Emperor Shah Jahan in memory of his beloved wife, considered one of the masterpieces of world architecture.

destinations.name: Galápagos Islands

cost.notes: Entry card for the National Park for foreigners + tour costs from 200 USD/day

destinations.description: Volcanic archipelago with incredible biodiversity that inspired Darwin's theory of evolution, home to unique species like giant tortoises, marine iguanas, and finches.

destinations.name: Kyoto
destinations.description: Ancient imperial capital of Japan with over 1,600 Buddhist temples, 400 Shinto shrines, Zen gardens, and cultural traditions like the tea ceremony and geishas.

destinations.name: Venice

cost.notes: Daily tourist tax + gondola ride from 80 EUR for 30 minutes

destinations.description: City built on 118 small islands separated by canals and connected by over 400 bridges, famous for its Gothic architecture, St. Mark's Square, and traditional gondolas.

destinations.name: Aurora Borealis

cost.notes: Guided tour to see the aurora (accommodation not included)

destinations.description: Natural light show dancing in the polar sky caused by charged solar particles colliding with Earth's atmosphere, creating stunning green and purple light curtains.
